cucumber-tsflow.configFilePath.description: Cucumber config file path (relative to cucumber-tsflow.projectPath e.g. './test/cucumber.json')

cucumber-tsflow.profile.description: Cucumber profile to use when running or debugging tests.

cucumber-tsflow.cucumberPath.description: Absolute path to project directory where cucumber.json is found (e.g. /home/me/project/sub-folder/test)

cucumber-tsflow.projectPath.description: Absolute path to project directory where packages.json and node_modules are found (e.g. /home/me/project/sub-folder)

cucumber-tsflow.runOptions.description: Add CLI Options to the Cucumber-tsflow Command e.g. https://github.com/LynxWall/cucumber-js-tsflow#new-configuration-options

cucumber-tsflow.debugOptions.description: Add or overwrite vscode debug configurations (only in debug mode) (e.g. { "args": ["--no-cache"] })

cucumber-tsflow.runCommand.description: The command that runs cucumber-tsflow. Defaults to: node "{Absolute Path}/node_modules/@lynxwall/cucumber-tsflow/bin/cucumber-tsflow"

cucumber-tsflow.stepFileSelector.description: CodeLens will be shown on files matching this pattern

cucumber-tsflow.featureFileSelector.description: CodeLens will be shown on files matching this pattern

cucumber-tsflow.preserveEditorFocus.description: Preserve focus on editor when running tests
